magic-square_key2: Magic Square is that kind of square in which sum of each row, sum of each column and sum of both the diagonals is equal.
magic-square_key3: You have to write this program that takes a nested list as input and checks whether it is a magic square or not?
magic-square_key4: This is a magic square because,
magic-square_key5: To visualize this sqaure, see it like a square. All the rows have same number of elements. Number of elements in row should be equal to number of elements in a column.
magic-square_key6: This is not a magic square :
magic-square_key7: Because the sum of elements of the second row is not 15 nahi hai, therefore this is not a magic square.
magic-square_key8: Edge Case 1
magic-square_key9: Pls see that the program that you wrote works for only 3x3 square or it works for any size of square.
magic-square_key10: Write this program for square of any size, square of any size so that if a user enters square of any size, your program should give the correct output.
magic-square_key11: Edge Case 2
magic-square_key12: For this nested list, what will be your answer - True or False.
magic-square_key14: If the given nested list is not a square, then return False, on the first go.
